===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ja|zh}} {{m|ja|やめて|tr=yamete|sc=Jpan||stop, no!}}, conjunctive of {{m|ja|やめる|tr=yameru|sc=Jpan||to stop, to cease, to abandon}}; from the groaning of female protagonists in {{w|AV idol|Japanese adult films}}.
